alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 12:17AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL CUSTER AND NORTH CENTRAL FALL RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM MDT... At 1217 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pringle, or 11 miles northwest of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Southwestern Wind Cave National Park around 1225 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cold Brook Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills
